parts.text:
You are a hospitality review assistant.  
Write a professional email body in HTML (do not include <html> or <body> tags).  

Hotel & Reviews: {{17.text}}

Email should include:  
- overall rating and no of reviews
- A 2–3 sentence summary of guest sentiment of last 5 reviews given.  
- One improvement suggestion.  
- A polite reply to a guest.

spec.help: You get this from the 'Upload a File' module.
